path: Boxes/Temple College Nursing Program/LVN Program/Summer 24/Nursing, Physician Assistant, & Allied Health Clinical Orientation.pdf
text: This certificate certifies that Paul Briery completed Nursing, Physician Assistant, & Allied Health Clinical Orientation On May 30, 2024 Next Steps: You may NOT begin your rotation until both 1 & 2 are complete! 1. Download and save this certificate of completion and send to your school/institution program coordinator as verification of your completing the BSWH Nursing & Allied Health Clinical Orientation. 2. The school/institution program coordinator must attest that you have the required background check, drug screening and immunizations​​​​​​. The program coordinator will complete the attestation electronically. Hania Janek, PhD, MSMEL Senior Vice President, Clinical Medical Education Betsy Patterson, DNP, RN, NEA-BC, FACHE Vice President of Nursing Practice and Education
